titles.title: Reign in me, sovereign Lord reign in me

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Reign in me, Sovereign Lord, reign in me,
Reign in me, Sovereign Lord, reign in me.
Captivate my heart,
My life to set apart,
Establish there Your throne,
Let Your will be done;
Reign in me, sovereign Lord, reign in me,
Reign in me, sovereign Lord, reign in me.
